price: 4. Or a little more. And recite the Qur’ân (aloud) in a slow, (pleasant tone and) style.[1]
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
